Bases: object

BASE_CONFIG = {'borrowing': {'interest_rate': 0.005, 'short_rate': 0.005}, 'constraints': {'borrowing': {'allowed': False, 'leverage': 1}, 'investing_style': {'long_only': True}, 'risk': {'max_asset_weight': 1, 'neutral_categories': []}, 'trading': {'turnover_limit': None}}, 'forecast': {'spread': {'n_prev_periods': 100}, 'start': None, 'std_dev': {'n_prev_periods': 100}, 'stop': None, 'volume': {'n_prev_periods': 100}}, 'restricted': {'all': [], 'long': [], 'short': []}, 'risk_model': {'aversion': 0.5, 'covariance_risk_factors': 15, 'use_full_covariance_matrix': False}, 'traiding': {'asymmetry': 0, 'ignore': {'holding_costs': False, 'trading_costs': False}, 'round_trip_costs_enabled': False, 'sensitivity': 1}}¶
create_forecast(df_forecast, col_name='std_dev')¶
create_initial_portfolio(initial_portfolio, aum)¶
create_price(df_return)¶
get_initial_t()¶
optimize()¶
pivot_and_fill(df, values, columns='asset', index='date', fill_method='bfill')¶
propagate(h, u, t)¶

From CvxPortfolio

Propagates the portfolio forward over time period t, given trades u.

Parameters:

  • h – pandas Series object describing current portfolio

  • u – n vector with the stock trades (not cash)

  • t – current time

Returns:

portfolio after returns propagation (for t to t+1 period) u: trades vector with simulated cash balance

Return type:

h_next

propagate(h, u, t)¶

From CvxPortfolio

Propagates the portfolio forward over time period t, given trades u.

  • u – n vector with the stock trades (not cash)
